6.6 million people filed for unemployment benefits last week, the highest number of claims in history. McConnell, we must get back to work now to pass monthly cash payments, suspend negative credit reporting, and do more to help the millions of Americans who are hurting.

People are losing their jobs and health insurance. Small business owners are losing their life’s work. Workers are still being forced to choose between staying home sick or putting food on the table. Millions have filed for unemployment.

Congress must get back to work—now.
